meanings.definition: A type of alcohol compound found in essential oils.
meanings.sent1: The geraniols in the essential oils give them a pleasant scent.
meanings.sent2: Essential oils often contain geraniols, which contribute to their fragrance.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled geraniols in my perfume, now I smell like a flower shop!
meanings.sent4: The geraniols danced in the air, spreading their sweet aroma everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The powerful geraniols in the oils lingered in the room long after they were used.
